# Deployment Guide - GitHub Pages

## üìã ‡∏™‡∏£‡∏∏‡∏õ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤

### 1. GitHub Repository Setup

**Repository Name**: `DataFabric-Academy.github.io`  
**Organization**: `DataFabric-Academy`

### 2. GitHub Pages Configuration

**Source**: `GitHub Actions`  
**Branch**: `gh-pages` (auto-generated by workflow)

#### ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤:
1. ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà **Settings** ‚Üí **Pages**
2. ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ **Source** ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô **GitHub Actions**
3. ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ **Custom domain** (‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏µ): `datafabric.academy`

### 3. GitHub Actions Workflow

Workflow file: `.github/workflows/deploy.yml`

**Trigger**:
- Push ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà `main` ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ `master` branch
- Manual trigger ‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô `workflow_dispatch`

**Build Process**:
1. Install dependencies (`pnpm install`)
2. Build Docusaurus site (`pnpm run build`)
3. Deploy ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á `gh-pages` branch

### 4. URLs

- **Main Portal**: `https://datafabric.academy/`
- **Course n8n**: ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô navbar (routeBasePath: `/course-n8n`)
- **Course Power BI**: ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô navbar (routeBasePath: `/course-power-bi`)
- **Course MS SQL**: ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô navbar (routeBasePath: `/course-ms-sql`)

## üöÄ Deploy

### First Time Setup

```bash
# Add remote (‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ)
git remote add origin https://github.com/DataFabric-Academy/DataFabric-Academy.github.io.git

# Push code
git push -u origin master
```

### Subsequent Deployments

```bash
# Sync content from Obsidian Vault
pnpm run sync

# Commit and push
git add .
git commit -m "docs: update content"
git push origin master
```

GitHub Actions ‡∏à‡∏∞ build ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ deploy ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥

## ‚úÖ Verification

‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å push code:
1. ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà **Actions** tab ‡πÉ‡∏ô GitHub repository
2. ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ workflow ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏à
3. ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏π‡πà (2-5 ‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ) ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ GitHub Pages deploy
4. ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ß‡πá‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ã‡∏ï‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà `https://datafabric.academy/`

## üîß Troubleshooting

### Workflow ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ô
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` ‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å push ‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ branch ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô `main` ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ `master`

### Build ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏ß
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö logs ‡πÉ‡∏ô **Actions** tab
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ `package.json` ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ `pnpm-lock.yaml` ‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á

### Deploy ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏à
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ **Settings** ‚Üí **Pages** ‚Üí **Source** ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô **GitHub Actions**
- ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö permissions ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á `GITHUB_TOKEN`
